channel.title: A comand from list?
channel.description:
ok well i no its possible, but the way i tryed failed badly.. infact almost crashed my computer lol cuz it wuldn't stop checking the list
so i gave up on trying myself
ANYONE GOT A WAY 2 DO THIS?
wat i want 1) when u type the command it checks the list if there name is on the list 2) after checking the list it says/does thing 3) if name is on list, teleports them to 3500,3500 and says "IT WORKED!" 4) if name not on list, says "your not a person that can do this"
[size=15pt]REP++ IF SUCESFUL[/size]

item.title: A comand from list?

item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

ok well i no its possible, but the way i tryed failed badly… infact almost crashed my computer lol cuz it wuldn’t stop checking the list

so i gave up on trying myself

ANYONE GOT A WAY 2 DO THIS?

wat i want

  1. when u type the command it checks the list if there name is on the list
  2. after checking the list it says/does thing
  3. if name is on list, teleports them to 3500,3500 and says “IT WORKED!”
  4. if name not on list, says “your not a person that can do this”

[size=15pt]REP++ IF SUCESFUL[/size]
